The post Watch Along and Upshot first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
Join us for a watch along !

We’re throwing a movie night with a side of pizza, and you’re invited! Join us on April 18th, kicking off at 6:00 PM sharp in room C2-14.

We’ll be screening the flick that’s leading the vote, and right now, it’s looking like Kizumonogatari is taking the crown. But hey, your vote could shake things up!

And what’s a movie night without some cheesy, delicious pizza? We’ve got plenty to go around!

So, grab your friends, sign up, and let’s make this movie night one to remember!

Catch you there !

Sign up form >> https://forms.gle/q5DGvAL6vELdkbXs6 <<

The post Watch Along and Upshot first appeared on iD8.

item.title: iD8 x SGGA
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
üéÆ Join us for an evening of exploration and engagement at the Level Up: Code and Play, presented in collaboration with SGGA (Singapore Games Association) and co-participants, the Wallstreet Club. üìÖ Date: 12th April 2024 üìç Venue: C4-04 (Apple Room) Timings: Don’t miss this chance to connect with like-minded individuals, Read more…

The post iD8 x SGGA first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
Join us for an evening of exploration and engagement at the Level Up: Code and Play, presented in collaboration with SGGA (Singapore Games Association) and co-participants, the Wallstreet Club.

Date: 12th April 2024

Venue: C4-04 (Apple Room)

Timings:

  • 5:00-6:30 PM: Immerse yourself in the world of gaming at our Game Expo, featuring exciting demos and interactive experiences.
  • 6:30-7:30 PM: Discover the mission and initiatives of SGGA during their informative talk, offering insights into the vibrant gaming landscape of Singapore.
  • 7:30-8:00 PM: Engage with fellow attendees and industry enthusiasts during our networking session, where connections are made and opportunities arise.

Don’t miss this chance to connect with like-minded individuals, learn from industry experts, and explore the dynamic intersection of gaming and community-building.

Check out SGGA (Singapore Games Association) 

https://www.sgga.org.sg/¬†
‚áè ¬†https://discord.gg/xyu8HmM5aD

The post iD8 x SGGA first appeared on iD8.

item.title: iD8 X WiT @NUS Computing
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
We are glad to announce that we will be collaborating with WiT (Women In Tech) @NUS Computing to celebrate Women’s day #InspireInclusion on 8th of March 2024 ! Date: Friday, 8th March 2024Time: 4 pm to 7 pm (3 hour long event)Venue: COM1-0206, Seminar Room 1National University of SingaporeComputing 113 Read more…

The post iD8 X WiT @NUS Computing first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
We are glad to announce that we will be collaborating with WiT (Women In Tech) @NUS Computing to celebrate Women’s day #InspireInclusion on 8th of March 2024 !

Date: Friday, 8th March 2024
Time: 4 pm to 7 pm (3 hour long event)
Venue: COM1-0206, Seminar Room 1
National University of Singapore
Computing 1
13 Computing Drive
Singapore 117417

Dinner will be provided at the event as well as iD8 will provide one way transportation from JCU campus to NUS campus.

At #InspireInclusion, we will be having guest speakers from Microsoft, Meta and NUS who will be sharing their experiences and values !

We encourage women of iD8 to part-take in this event as it will be an opportunity to network with fellow female students from other IHLs like SIT, NTU, SUSS, SMU and industry professionals, moreover this event can help you identify role models in the IT industry.

To sign up for this event, please contact the President or Vice President of iD8. We have a limited amount of seats for this event.

President: Namman Shukla
WhatsApp: +65 94469523

Vice President: Albert Alvaro
WhatsApp: +65 81513096

The post iD8 X WiT @NUS Computing first appeared on iD8.

item.title: Welcome Party and Contest !
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Hello iD8 Members, We are organizing our Welcome Party on the 29th(Thursday) at 6 PM… Mark your calendars and shift your doctor’s appointment cause we’ll be having Food, JackBox and I’ll be discussing some future plans. In this post, we have an encrypted message which will grant the person who Read more…

The post Welcome Party and Contest ! first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
Hello iD8 Members,

We are organizing our Welcome Party on the 29th(Thursday) at 6 PM… Mark your calendars and shift your doctor’s appointment cause we’ll be having Food, JackBox and I’ll be discussing some future plans.

In this post, we have an encrypted message which will grant the person who solves it, special privileges during the welcome party !

Instructions: You’re welcome to ideate and think about the encrypted text and once you get the answer, email us or pm us on one of our socials the answer you think is correct. We will reveal the winner as soon as we get the right answer !

The post Welcome Party and Contest ! first appeared on iD8.

item.title: Welcome to SP51/24
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Greetings to all iD8 Members and Welcome to the new trimester ! Hope you all are signed up and ready to go as the iD8 booth at the club drive goes live at 11 AM to 3 PM. Every Sign-up is eligible for a free gift which can be collected Read more…

The post Welcome to SP51/24 first appeared on iD8.
item.content:encoded:
Greetings to all iD8 Members and Welcome to the new trimester !

Hope you all are signed up and ready to go as the iD8 booth at the club drive goes live at 11 AM to 3 PM.

Every Sign-up is eligible for a free gift which can be collected from the club drive booth on 21st February 2024. The gifts are limited to 30 sign ups, so if you signed up for iD8… make sure to pick up your gift from the booth within the allotted time.

For our welcome party, we will be hosting it on 29th February 2024 from 6 PM to 9 PM where additional information about upcoming events will be given with food and games !

Sign up for the welcome party here and keep an eye on all our socials like WhatsApp, Instagram and Discord for announcements.

~ Namman Shukla (President)

The post Welcome to SP51/24 first appeared on iD8.
